languages.text: "Машинные духи не благоволят тебе. Позволь мне умилостивить их надлежащим образом". {n}Паскаль склоняется над когитатором и погружается в работу.{/n}
"The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in the appropriate manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and sets to work.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Машинные духи не благоволят тебе. Позволь мне умилостивить их надлежащим образом". {n}Паскаль склоняется над когитатором и погружается в работу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to placate them in due manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and delves into work.{/n}
"The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to placate them in due manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and delves into work.{/n}
"The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in due manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and delves into work.{/n}

"The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in the appropriate manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and sets to work.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Maschinengeister sind Euch nicht wohlgesonnen. Gestattet mir, sie auf angemessene Weise zu besänftigen." {n}Pasqal beugt sich über den Cogitator und macht sich ans Werk.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in the appropriate manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and sets to work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Maschinengeister sind Euch nicht wohlgesonnen. Gestattet mir, sie auf angemessene Weise zu besänftigen." {n}Pasqal beugt sich über den Cogitator und stürzt sich in die Arbeit.{/n}

languages.text: « Les esprits de la machine ne sont pas bien disposés envers vous. Laissez-moi les apaiser comme il se doit. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur le cogitateur et se met à l'œuvre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in the appropriate manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and sets to work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les esprits de la machine ne sont pas bien disposés envers vous. Laissez-moi les apaiser comme il se doit. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur le cogitateur et se met à l'œuvre.{/n}

languages.text: “机魂对你怀有敌意。请允许我以正确的方式安抚他们。”{n}帕斯卡靠近沉思者，开始工作。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in the appropriate manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and sets to work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “机魂对你怀有敌意。请允许我以正确的方式安抚他们。”{n}帕斯卡靠近思考器，开始工作。{/n}

languages.text: 「機械精霊達は、あなたに敵意がある。適切な手段で彼らをなだめさせてくれ」{n}パスカルは考算機の上に身を乗り出し、機械を詳しく調べ始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in the appropriate manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and sets to work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「機械精霊達は、あなたに敵意がある。しかるべき方法で彼らをなだめさせてくれ」{n}パスカルは考算機の上に身を乗り出し、機械を詳しく調べ始めた。{/n}

languages.text: «Los espíritus máquina están en su contra. Permítame apaciguarlos de forma adecuada». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el cogitador y se pone a trabajar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in the appropriate manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and sets to work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los espíritus máquina están en su contra. Permítame apaciguarlos como es debido». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el cogitador y se pone a trabajar.{/n}

languages.text: "Makine ruhları, size pek sıcak bakmıyor. Bırakın, onlara münasip şekilde hitap edip gönüllerini yapayım." {n}Pasqal, kavramsayara doğru eğilip işe koyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits are ill-disposed toward you. Allow me to appease them in the appropriate manner." {n}Pasqal leans over the cogitator and sets to work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Makine ruhları, size pek sıcak bakmıyor. Bırakın, sizin yerinize onlara en münasip şekilde sesleneyim." {n}Pasqal, kavramsayara doğru eğilip işe koyuluyor.{/n}
